title: libcaffe2.a for Android is too large
body_html: I built the libcaffe2.a for android as the guide[./scripts/build_android.sh]. The build is success, but I find that the library is too large[800MB+]. The library file in Android Demo(such as AICamera-Style-Transfer & AICamera) is small[Only 60MB]. Is there a way to reduce the file size? How to config?
